title: Scary Cool
description: All Zara wants is to get through high school like any ordinary girl. But Zara is no ordinary girl. And when Lance Donovan shows up, she fears her days at Cherry Glen High are numbered -- because Lance is a creature of power, and he has other plans for her life. Should she surrender or fight? Dark forces are converging on Cherry Glen, and Zara's decision could change her life forever ... or end it.
author: Diane Farr
